text: Tofiga Vaevalu Falani has been the Governor-General of Tuvalu since 29 September 2021. He was Acting Governor General on 14 August 2017. He was appointed as a Member of the British Empire for public and community service in the 2014 New Year Honours. == References == Category:Governors-General of Tuvalu Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Tofiga Vaevalu Falani
